education_text.0: Before leaving the      University of Pretoria University of Pretoria Phiwa attempted to work with the Swaziland National Library and the Manzini Regional Education Office in 2013 but was rejectedOn 24 October 2015, he released the first tuition crowdfunding platform in South Africa in the wake of the      FeesMustFall protests that saw the country's tertiary institutions shut down to help save students from tuition debtIn September 2020 Nkambule was one of the entrepreneurs named in a book titled  Entrepreneurs Who Changed History  published by
